data.code_arm_required: Code required to Arm or Disarm

data_description.name: The name of the alarm
data_description.code: An optional code needed to enable or disable the alarm. This can be either a number or a string.
data_description.code_arm_required: If set, the code is required to arm and the alarm. If not set, the code is required to disarm the alarm
data_description.delay_time: The time in seconds to delay before triggering the alarm. This gives you time to enter the code before the alarm triggers.
data_description.arming_time: The time in seconds of the delay before arming the alarm. This gives you extra time to leave when arming the alarm.
data_description.trigger_time: The time in seconds that the alarm fires when triggered.
data_description.disarm_after_trigger: Determines the behavior of the alarm after triggering. The alrm will either stay armed or disarm.

user.description: Configure an alarm system in Home Assistant that can be used with automations.
